statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -13 \\ 9 \\ -5 \\ 5 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -20 \\ 10 \\ -6 \\ 8 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 31 \\ -8 \\ 6 \\ -13 \\ -16 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
